entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Yorkton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 7:19 a.m. CST Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High 13. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CST Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low zero.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low zero. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CST Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming east 50 gusting to 70 near noon. High plus 5. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CST Monday 17 April 2023
